title: Your weather update for Wednesday (16)
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); The Department of Meteorology announced that cloudy skies can be expected in the Central, Southern, Western, Sabaragamuwa, and Uva provinces on Wednesday (16).
Showers or thundershowers will occur at a few places in Sabaragamuwa and Southern provinces and in Kaluthara district after 4.00 p.m on Wednesday (16).
Brent, U.S. crude below $100 for the first time since late Feb
